name: sih
creator: Microsoft Corporation.
comment: This daily task launches the SIH client (server-initiated healing) to detect and fix system components that are vital to automatic updating of Windows and Microsoft software installed on the machine.  This task can go online  evaluate applicability of healing actions  download necessary payloads to execute the actions  and execute healing actions.
description: The file is signed and the signature was verified.
